revised_title: George Johnstone Stoney and the Discovery of the Electron
tldr: The article discusses the life and scientific contributions of George Johnstone Stoney, who determined the charge of the atom or particle of electricity and proposed the name "electron" for this quantity. Stoney's work on the kinetic theory of gases and spectroscopy was his most significant achievement, and he made the first estimate of the electron's value in 1874.
